question: The "Grand Bara Desert" is located in which country?
explanation: The Grand Bara Desert, also known as Bara Wein, is a desert located in the Ali Sabieh-Arta-Dikhil regions of Djibouti. It consists of large areas of sand flats with sparse, semi-desert and desert grasses and scrubs vegetation. This desert is largely formed due to drying up of lake beds. It is part of the Ethiopian Xeric grasslands and shrublands ecoregion.
